TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit IUnknownConstantAttribute extends System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CustomConstantAttribute

Docs.summary: Indicates that the default value for the attributed field or parameter is an instance of <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.UnknownWrapper>, where the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.UnknownWrapper.WrappedObject%2A> is . This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can apply this attribute to fields or parameters.
The type library importer uses this attribute to distinguish a default value of type `VT_UNKNOWN` from `null`.
For more information about constant attributes, see the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CustomConstantAttribute> class.
The classes in <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices> are for compiler writers use only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the constant stored in this attribute.
Docs.value: The constant stored in this attribute. Only is allowed for an constant value.
Docs.returns: The constant stored in this attribute. Only is allowed for an constant value.
